programme.title: Melania Trump: A Very Beautiful First Lady

programme.title: The Trump Wars
programme.desc: Investigations tried to prove Trump's campaign colluded with Russia. But Trump hit back against the "collusion delusion" and won.

programme.title: American Moses: The Charlton Heston Story
programme.desc: Moses to Michelangelo, civil rights leader to astronaut on Planet of the Apes, Charlton Heston was always more than a Hollywood star. With a career spanning 60 years & a hundred films, he was a cultural warrior & never backed down from controversy.

programme.title: America Burning
programme.desc: Big media ignore riots and chaos in the wake of George Floyd's death as the 2020 election looms.
